messages.subject: Re: FW: Dr. Phil show anyone?
messages.msgSnippet: Mike McEwen They re looking for homeschoolers:  ************************************* Great.  No matter
messages.messageBody:
Mike McEwen
They're looking for homeschoolers:

<http://www.drphil.com/plugger/respond/?plugID=10527>
*************************************
Great. No matter what great families they might interview,
they'll probably find the most outrageous family to put on the
air and ridicule the whole concept of homeschooling.

I thought his show was cancelled.

C

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] FW: Dr. Phil show anyone?
messages.msgSnippet: We don t need no stinkin textbooks. I want this on a t-shirt! Kirsten ... From: Michelle Leifur Reid To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com Sent: Sunday,
messages.messageBody:
We don't need no stinkin' textbooks.

I want this on a t-shirt!

Kirsten
